newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain's Iberia starts flights to Helsinki, Oslo.
newsitem.headline: Spain's Iberia starts flights to Helsinki, Oslo.

text.p: Spanish national airline Iberia said on Thursday that it would initiate daily flights to Helsinki and Oslo from both Madrid and Barcelona on July 1.
The two new destinations, which will be reached via stopovers in Hamburg, Germany, bring to 30 the number of European cities Iberia flies to, Iberia said in a statement.
